description: Details pursuant to fully discharge condition 8 (Photovoltaic Panels) and 13 (Plant Noise Limits) and to partially discharge condition 12 (BREEAM) of planning permission 19/0042/FUMOPDC dated 03/07/2019 for 'Demolition of three existing buildings and erection of two storey industrial building comprising c. 1450sqm of industrial floorspace (Use Class B1(c)/B2/B8) with ancillary offices, means of access, vehicle and cycle parking, drainage infrastructure, boundary treatments, landscaping and associated works'.
